components: SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING
summary: 1. ENGINE STALLS ERRATICALLY WHEN UNDER ACCELERATION IE: WHEN ENTERING FREEWAY, ETC. FORD ACKNOWLEDGES THE PROBLEM, STATES DOES NOT KNOW HOW TO FIX IT. 2. BRAKE FAILURE IN STOP AND GO TRAFFIC.  VEHICLES CURRENTLY HAS LESS THAN 10,000 MILES ON THEM.  BOTH HAVE SAME PROBLEMS.  *NLM
